name: Zoramites Consult People Privately
description: Zoramite leaders consult privately with the people about the teachings of Alma and his brethren.

location.name: Antionum
location.description: east of the land of Zarahemla, which lay nearly bordering upon the seashore, which was south of the land of Jershon, which also bordered upon the wilderness south, which wilderness was full of the Lamanites.
